data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vanin, Sergio Antonio, Mermudes, José Ricardo M. (2007): Two new Tachygonidius species from the Atlantic coast of Brazil (Coleoptera: Curculionidae). Zootaxa 1415: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175683
